Write-up

Simple enough, the flag is within a HTML comment tag in the source code.

bash $ curl http://ctf.infosecinstitute.com/levelone.php | grep flag <!-- infosec_flagis_welcome --> ## Links * http://ctf.infosecinstitute.com/levelone.php
